1.title: Casus Belli
1.plot: Three years after overcoming the global famine, the United States Navy is ready to unveil its first fully functional fleet since the Red Flu pandemic, but a new type of threat may mean the next world war.

2.title: Fog of War
2.plot: Thrust back to World War II era military technology, Nathan James must think fast to survive a fight with limited weapons capabilities.

3.title: El Puente
3.plot: With nations being rapidly occupied, Chandler tries his hand at diplomacy to unite two hostile countries so they can fight a common enemy.

4.title: Tropic of Cancer
4.plot: As Nathan James and her allies attempt to prevent the enemy moving north, Chandler's haunting visions manifest into reality.

5.title: Warriors
5.plot: After months of fighting, the crew of Nathan James must embark on a dangerous mission to secure important intel that could decide the fate of the war.

6.title: Air Drop
6.plot: Nathan James must seek the aide of a prominent rebel leader in order to create a staging area before mounting an invasion of their own.

7.title: Somos la Sangre
7.plot: Pinned down after days of fighting, Vulture team must find their way into a secretive enemy camp.

8.title: Honor
8.plot: With a devastating hostage situation occurring back home, Chandler must devise the perfect plan to avoid losing everything.

9.title: Courage
9.plot: Preparations to invade Columbia begins. Many obstacles are faced; one hero is lost.

10.title: Commitment
10.plot: In the Series Finale, it is all out war as Chandler must face his fears and confront the greatest threat he has ever encountered.

1.title: Phase Six
1.plot: CO CDR Tom Chandler and his crew find themselves in a whole new world when the ship's scientist passenger, Dr. Rachel Scott, reveals that the entire planet is in their hands.

2.title: Welcome to Gitmo
2.plot: Chandler and his crew head to the U.S. Military base at Guantanamo Bay in hopes of collecting food, medical supplies and fuel replenishments.

3.title: Dead Reckoning
3.plot: The James faces off against a new foe who demands Chandler hand over Rachel and her research.

4.title: We'll Get There
4.plot: Mechanical problems leave the ship with a severe shortage of drinking water.

5.title: El Toro
5.plot: With Rachel close to a breakthrough on her vaccine, she, Chandler and XO Slattery lead a small team into the jungles of Nicaragua on a mission to find monkeys for her vaccine trials.

6.title: Lockdown
6.plot: With monkeys for testing, they work towards a vaccine but with no cure in sight, a serious lack of monkeys and increasingly depressing distress calls, they think about returning to Nicaragua.

7.title: SOS
7.plot: After picking up a distress call near Jamaica, Chandler and a small team stage a rescue attempt. But a surprise attack leaves Chandler and Tex stranded at sea.

8.title: Two Sailors Walk Into a Bar...
8.plot: With Chandler and Tex held prisoner on the Russian ship, it is up to Slattery to devise a plot to free them.

9.title: Trials
9.plot: With a potential cure in their grasp, Dr. Scott asks for human volunteer's to test her formula that was successful on a monkey. However, will this be the answer she is looking for, or will it put the volunteers' lives in jeopardy?

10.title: No Place Like Home
10.plot: The crew of the USS Nathan James arrive in Baltimore with the cure expecting a welcoming committee, but what they find is something else entirely.

1.title: Unreal City
1.plot: Chandler and his fractured team join forces with an underground resistance in an attempt to defeat Amy Granderson; Rachael tries to help the sick while remaining a prisoner; Sidney and the crew try to regain control of their ship.

2.title: Fight the Ship
2.plot: Slattery and the crew of Nathan James are in a race against time to save an injured Dr. Tophet and regain control of their ship.

3.title: It's Not a Rumor
3.plot: The ship goes to Norfolk so that the crew can check on their families. And Chandler gives them the opportunity to decide if they want to continue or remain. Something even he is considering.

4.title: Solace
4.plot: The crew makes a discovery; Chandler sees an opportunity to add another ship to the fleet.

5.title: Achilles
5.plot: Chandler and his crew face off against a nuclear-powered submarine led by British naval officers.

6.title: Long Day's Journey
6.plot: Chandler tracks the immunes to Northern Florida; Rachel comes across a secret formula.

7.title: Alone and Unafraid
7.plot: Slattery struggles to evade the sub; Chandler and the land team infiltrate the immune compound.

8.title: Safe Zone
8.plot: Trying to piece together Dr. Hunter's lost formula, Rachel grapples with the fact Niels, her sworn enemy, is on board Nathan James, while Chandler works to gain intel and reverse the brainwashing Michener suffered at the hands of the Ramseys.

9.title: Uneasy Lies the Head
9.plot: Chandler and his team set out to find supplies and materials for Dr. Scott's lab, only to tangle with bounty hunters and the Immunes. Meanwhile, Rachel's effort to find a spreadable cure depends on the scientist who nearly erased mankind.

10.title: Friendly Fire
10.plot: Rachel is hard at work on a new, more efficient version of the cure while Alisha decodes a message found on a cell phone recovered from the Immunes on land.

11.title: Valkyrie
11.plot: Sean Ramsey broadcasts a message implicating the Navy in a devastating disaster.

12.title: Cry Havoc
12.plot: The Nathan James is trapped between the sub and the civilian blockades set up by the immune. Chandler sends Dr. Scott off the ship under Slattery's protection.

13.title: A More Perfect Union
13.plot: As small Immune factions continue to fight the cure, CDR Chandler, and his team, put a call out to civilians to meet them at ports all over the United States to receive the cure.

1.title: The Scott Effect
1.plot: Chandler is sent to Asia to probe a possible mutation of the Red Flu. Captain Slattery and his crew deliver a cure to Southeast Asia but they might be heading toward an unforeseen threat.

2.title: Rising Sun
2.plot: Chandler tries to return to his old crew while sharpening attention on a menacing new enemy.

3.title: Shanzhai
3.plot: Chandler scrambles to find answers in an Asian Dodge City. Meanwhile, Slattery seeks the truth about his predicament.

4.title: Devil May Care
4.plot: China's president was given the cure, however he has refused to give it out to the people and countries around his land. Chandler believes he can not trust him at all.

5.title: Minefield
5.plot: Chandler's mission becomes complicated as his position is worsened. President Michener faces pressure from the regional leaders.

6.title: Dog Day
6.plot: Chandler's mission comes to a head as he prepares the final part of his plan. President Michener ponders the fate of his presidency.

7.title: In the Dark
7.plot: The Nathan James must dodge an overwhelming threat. Meanwhile, President Michener is put in a terrible position following a revelation in St. Louis.

8.title: Sea Change
8.plot: America copes with tragedy. Meanwhile, Chandler probes a potential virus mutation.

9.title: Paradise
9.plot: Chandler unearths a lead that could resolve menacing questions. Meanwhile, Kara snoops in the White House.

10.title: Scuttle
10.plot: Chandler faces a tough decision when the White House delivers a bizarre order.

11.title: Legacy
11.plot: A final showdown pits Chandler against his formidable enemy. Elsewhere, Kara joins forces with someone who can help with her mission.

12.title: Resistance
12.plot: Chandler returns to America to find out what has really been happening.

13.title: Don't Look Back
13.plot: The fight for America comes to an end. Chandler faces a challenge that could change his life forever.

1.title: In Medias Res
1.plot: Sixteen months after thwarting the coup in America, Nathan James must face yet another global disaster. The question remains, where in the world is Tom Chandler?

2.title: The Pillars of Hercules
2.plot: Having lost their only lead, the crew of Nathan James continues their search for an item that could save the world. Chandler immerses himself in a mission for revenge.

3.title: Bread and Circuses
3.plot: Nathan James's crew searches for a precious item leading them to a strange place of opulence and violence where they cross paths with a most unexpected ally.

4.title: Nostos
4.plot: Chandler and his team search for Slattery while evading Giorgio and Omar's men. Slattery begins to hallucinate seeing his family. The Nathan James faces off with a Hydra class Greek Navy vessel.

5.title: Allegiance
5.plot: Nathan James is diverted from their mission when they receive a suspicious distress call from a fishing trawler.

6.title: Tempest
6.plot: With an enormous storm on the horizon, Nathan James must navigate an equally terrifying threat in order to make it to safety.

7.title: Feast
7.plot: While searching for the location of the stolen seeds, the crew of the Nathan James fights off an old enemy to escape with intel that reveals Dr. Vellick's sinister plans for humanity.

8.title: Lazaretto
8.plot: An undercover mission in the land of the dead leads to disturbing revelations about Dr. Vellek's sinister plans.

9.title: Detect, Deceive, Destroy
9.plot: The crew of Nathan James faces a threat that will test the limits of their Naval tactics and strategies.

10.title: Endgame
10.plot: Chandler confronts his enemy and his personal demons in the final showdown, with the fate of humanity on the line.

locations: MBS Media Campus - 1600 Rosecrans Avenue, Manhattan Beach, California, USA::(studio) (studio - Season 1)
Los Angeles Harbor, San Pedro, Los Angeles, California, USA
Culver Studios - 9336 W. Washington Blvd., Culver City, California, USA::(studio) (studio - Season 2)
imdb.plot outline: Naval Destroyer Nathan James is sent on what they're told is a research mission in the Arctic. Accompanying them is scientist, Rachel Scott. After a few months in the Arctic while Scott is on the ice doing research, some men attack them. They get back to the ship and the Commander, Tom Chandler asks the doctor what's going on. She says that a deadly disease broke out a few months ago. At first, they thought it was contained but they had no cure. They felt that the cure was in the Arctic which why she's here. But she has since received word that it has now spread to most of the globe. Chandler tries to call the President but learns the President and Vice President are dead and the US government might not have long to survive. The current President tells him that the Nathan James was not in the hot zone so he and his crew are OK. But now it's up to them to safeguard Scott because she holds the key to the planet's survival. But there are those who want the cure too and they will do whatever they have to, to get it. So they keep going and trying to find supplies and what they need so Scott can make the cure.
imdb.title: The Last Ship

other companies.name: Marc Graue Recording Studios: Voiceover and Post

plot: The crew of a naval destroyer is forced to confront the reality of a new existence when a pandemic kills off most of the earth's population.::Anonymous

Naval Destroyer Nathan James is sent on what they're told is a research mission in the Arctic. Accompanying them is scientist, Rachel Scott. After a few months in the Arctic while Scott is on the ice doing research, some men attack them. They get back to the ship and the Commander, Tom Chandler asks the doctor what's going on. She says that a deadly disease broke out a few months ago. At first, they thought it was contained but they had no cure. They felt that the cure was in the Arctic which why she's here. But she has since received word that it has now spread to most of the globe. Chandler tries to call the President but learns the President and Vice President are dead and the US government might not have long to survive. The current President tells him that the Nathan James was not in the hot zone so he and his crew are OK. But now it's up to them to safeguard Scott because she holds the key to the planet's survival. But there are those who want the cure too and they will do whatever they have to, to get it. So they keep going and trying to find supplies and what they need so Scott can make the cure.::rcs0411@yahoo.com

A deadly virus has destroyed much of life on earth. A US Navy destroyer, USS Nathan James, is sent on a secret mission to try to develop a vaccine. On board is Doctor Rachel Scott, a top microbiologist / immunologist. It is her job to create the vaccine. In order to complete the mission, the ship has to sail to many different parts of the world, with many hindrances to her mission's progress along the way...::grantss

Their mission is simple: Find a cure. Stop the virus. Save the world. When a global pandemic wipes out eighty percent of the planet's population, the crew of a lone naval destroyer must find a way to pull humanity from the brink of extinction.::ahmetkozan
